name: Beyond Your Fear
storyline: In 1987, a police officer was brutally tortured and killed in his own home. As a private investigator, you were called in to investigate the case, but your efforts were abruptly cut short by unknown forces. Now, haunted by the unsolved murder and the unexplained dismissal from the case, you must unravel the truth behind the officer's death and confront the darkness that lurks in the shadows. Will you be able to face your fears and solve the case, or will you fall victim to the same mysterious force that silenced the officer's final moments?
summary: Descend into an atmospheric, story-driven psychological horror game where the player must investigate a case, solve riddles, and make hard choices on the way to uncovering what lies beyond your fear.
